plot: Alex, a young, wealthy investor, puts money into an experimental drug, hoping to find a cure for his fiancée's depression. His impulsive behavior inevitably causes him to lose everything for money and greed.
title: Compound 147
plot_es: Alex, a young, wealthy investor, puts money into an experimental drug, hoping to find a cure for his fiancée's depression. His impulsive behavior inevitably causes him to lose everything for money and greed.
